# grab those images!
grabbit
  # path to editor
  --editor
  # Print help information
  --help , -h
  # another command
  command2
  # another command
  command3
  # do the grabbity grabbity
  grab
  # Change grabbit's config
  config
    # Edit the config. A default config will be created if it doesn't exist
    edit
      # path to editor
      --editor
  # another section
  section2
    # Dummy command to pass validation
    com
  # another section
  section3
    # Dummy command to pass validation
    com
